comment.author: Christina
comment.text: Get your wife and kids out there. You are a great example to all. You are for everyone.

replies.author: Michael
replies.text: He said it was big mistake to put a wife to work. Try to keep up .. so did you make the sandwiches you were supposed to do today?

replies.author: Christina
replies.text: Michael V I do it all everyday. His wife is a good lady and his family are great too. Have a nice evening.

replies.author: Michael
replies.text: Christina Sure, I am a huge snob, don't want a First Lady that was a nude model, can be the daughter of the President in age difference, plagiarizes speeches, can't even speak proper English (I can, and fluent in two languages), is a THIRD wife to someone that has been openly adulterous to previous wives .. oh, she also lied about her education attainment, and made her website disappear when it was found out. There is more, but like I said I am a snob. Yes I prefer Bill .. even though he was a womanizer, and repented and has behaved well since 1998.
